title: Life After Y2K - Dr. Samuel C. Gipp
description:
GLOBAL WARMING!!! SWINE FLU!!! EBOLA!!! brought to you by the same people who told you about Y2K.

Enjoy a light-hearted look back at who created the Y2K "crisis" and made so many Americans act rather foolishly.

Stop and think about it. It was our good friends in the News Media that first brought the Y2K ?problem? to our attention. Then they ?investigated,? got ?expert? opinions on it, and gave us the ?worst case scenarios? ? we got ?the whole story? and it created fear, panic and terror!

This book will help you to keep you from getting burned by the latest News Media induced theatrics.


About the author:
Dr. Gipp is a former pastor, an evangelist, teacher, author and Bible conference speaker. He has the unique ability to digest large amounts of information and then present it in an analytical, understandable, format. His humerous, informative and forceful preaching style make him popular with all ages and keeps him in demand as a Revivalist and Bible conference speaker
